RegisterUserDto - Class in com.nickfiorentino.model.dto
RegisterUserDto is a class used to hold the registration information for a new user that's sent from the client to the server for the register endpoint.

RestAllClassesService - Class in com.nickfiorentino.service
Service class responsible for retrieving all playable classes from Blizzard's World of Warcraft (Classic) API.
RestAllClassesService(RestBlizzardAuthenticationService) - Constructor for class com.nickfiorentino.service.RestAllClassesService
Constructs a new RestAllClassesService with the given authentication service.
RestAllItemsService - Class in com.nickfiorentino.service
Service class responsible for retrieving item data from Blizzard's World of Warcraft (Classic) API.
RestAllItemsService(RestBlizzardAuthenticationService) - Constructor for class com.nickfiorentino.service.RestAllItemsService
Constructs a new RestAllItemsService with the given authentication service.
RestAllRacesService - Class in com.nickfiorentino.service
Service class responsible for retrieving the full list of playable races from Blizzard's World of Warcraft API using a bearer token for authentication.
RestAllRacesService(RestBlizzardAuthenticationService) - Constructor for class com.nickfiorentino.service.RestAllRacesService
Constructs a new RestAllRacesService using the provided authentication service.
RestBlizzardAuthenticationService - Class in com.nickfiorentino.service
Service class responsible for authenticating with the Blizzard Battle.net OAuth server and retrieving an access token required to make authorized requests to the World of Warcraft API.
RestBlizzardAuthenticationService(String, String) - Constructor for class com.nickfiorentino.service.RestBlizzardAuthenticationService
Constructs a new instance of the authentication service using environment variables for client credentials.
